Title: Day ahead
Description: The information provided concerns a day ahead process.

Title: Intra day incremental
Description: The information provided concerns an intra day schedule.

Title: Inter-area transit
Description: The information provided concerns an inter area transit schedule. The rules governing this process are market dependent

Title: System operation closure
Description: The information provided concerns the closure of a given period of both scheduled and regulation information.

Title: Metered data aggregation
Description: The information provided concerns the aggregation process of metered information.

Title: Imbalance settlement
Description: The information provided concerns the imbalance settlement for a given period for a balance responsible party or parties.

Title: Capacity allocation
Description: The information provided concerns the capacity allocation process.

Title: Central reconciliation
Description: The process carried out to finalise the imbalance settlement based on actual metered values against provisional values from profiled metering points.

Title: Released capacity allocation
Description: The process concerns the notification of capacity rights that are being released.

Title: Proposed capacity allocation
Description: The process concerns the proposed capacity to be allocated for a given border.

Title: Agreed capacity allocation
Description: The process concerns the capacity that has been agreed for allocation for a border.

Title: Long term
Description: The process concerns scheduling all schedules except daily and intraday contracts.

Title: Post scheduling adjustment
Description: The process concerns the adjustments made to previous schedules after the period of execution.

Title: Forecast
Description: The data contained in the document are to be handled in short, medium, long term forecasting process.

Title: Capacity determination
Description: The process of determining the capacity for use.

Title: Realised
Description: The process for the treatment of realised data as opposed to forecast data.

Title: Schedule day
Description: The process concerns the day ahead, intraday and eventually ex-post scheduling in a single document. The schedule will be transferred within the total position including historic information.

Title: Intraday total
Description: This process concerns an intraday schedule which contains the accumulated day ahead and intraday current position.

Title: Intraday accumulated
Description: This process concerns a single intraday schedule process where only intraday evolutions occur through version changes.

Title: SOMA process
Description: System Operator meter alignment process.

Title: SOVM process
Description: System Operator validated measurement process.

Title: RGCE accounting process
Description: The document provides ENTSO-E Regional Group Continental Europe accounting process information.

Title: CCSR RGCE Settlement
Description: The process concerns the control center settlement report for the whole of the ENTSO-E Regional Group Continental Europe.

Title: CBSR Settlement
Description: The process concerns the control block settlement report.

Title: CASR Settlement
Description: The process concerns the control area settlement report.

Title: Outage information
Description: The process concerns TSO publication of outages on its power system.

Title: Reserve resource process
Description: The process being described is for general reserve resources.

Title: Primary reserve process
Description: The process being described is for primary reserves.

Title: Secondary reserve process
Description: The process being described is for secondary reserves.

Title: Tertiary reserve process
Description: The process being described is for tertiary reserves.

Title: Week ahead
Description: The process being described is for the week ahead.

Title: Month ahead
Description: The process being described is for the month ahead.

Title: Year ahead
Description: The process being described is for the year ahead.

Title: Contracted
Description: The process being described is for contracted information.

Title: Network information
Description: The process being described is for network information.

Title: Creation
Description: The process being described is for the creation of information.

Title: Modification
Description: The process being described is for the modification of information.

Title: Deactivation process
Description: The process being described is for deactivation of information.

Title: Synchronisation process
Description: The process being described is for the synchronisation of information.

Title: Intraday process
Description: The process being described is for intraday process.

Title: Redispatch process
Description: The process being described is for redispatch activation.

Title: Activation history process
Description: The process being described is for the provision of an activation history.

Title: Flow based domain constraint day-ahead
Description: The information provided concerns the flow-based process in day ahead.

Title: Flow based domain constraint intraday
Description: The information provided concerns the flow-based process in intraday.

Title: Two days ahead
Description: Two days ahead.

Title: Replacement reserve
Description: A process being described is for replacement reserves (RR) to restore or support the required level of frequency restoration reserves.

Title: Manual frequency restoration reserve
Description: A process being described is for manual frequency restoration reserves (mFRR).

Title: Day-ahead capacity determination
Description: The process run at the day-ahead timeframe to determine the capacity for use.

Title: Intraday capacity determination
Description: The process run at the intraday timeframe to determine the capacity for use.

Title: Long term capacity determination
Description: The process run at the long term timeframe to determine the capacity for use.

Title: Automatic frequency restoration reserve
Description: A process being described is for automatic frequency restoration reserves (aFRR).

Title: Frequency containment reserve
Description: A process being described is for frequency containment reserves (FCR).

Title: Common Grid Model (CGM) merging process
Description: The process for merging individual grid models to form the common grid model.

Title: Coordinated security analysis
Description: The process being described is used for coordinated security analysis.

Title: Exchange of master data
Description: A process for exchanging master data.

Title: Frequency restoration reserve
Description: The process being described is for general frequency restoration reserve.

Title: FSKAR settlement
Description: The information provided concerns the Financial Settlement of K?f, ACE and ramping period settlement for a given period.

Title: mFRR capacity market
Description: Processes related to the Reserve option market to assure that there are enough available reserves for the manual FRR market.

Title: Internal trade reporting
Description: The process related to internal trade reporting.

Title: Scheduled activation mFRR
Description: mFRR being subject to scheduled activation.

Title: Direct activation mFRR
Description: mFRR being subject to direct activation.

Title: Registration
Description: A process related to the registration and management of object information.

Title: Imbalance Netting
Description: The process described is for imbalance netting.

Title: Criteria application for instantaneous frequency
Description: The process describes criteria application for instantaneous frequency.

Title: Criteria application for frequency restoration
Description: The process describes criteria application for frequency restoration.

Title: Cost sharing
Description: The process describes the cost sharing process for costly remedial actions.

Title: Central selection aFRR
Description: aFRR subject to central selection of bids for activation.

Title: Local selection aFRR
Description: aFRR subject to local selection of bids for activation.

Title: Common grid model alignment
Description: The process for aligning bidding zone net positions.

Title: Pan-European verification function
Description: The process for verifying bidding zone net positions.

Title: Outage planning coordination
Description: The process being described is used for outage planning coordination.

Title: Short term adequacy
Description: The process being described is used for short term adequacy calculations.

Title: Coordinated capacity calculation
Description: The process being described is used for coordinated capacity calculation.

Title: Access to metered data
Description: Access to meter readings of electricity consumption from or electricity feed into the grid.

Title: Permission administration
Description: Administration of permissions to access and/or use data.
